nodes.text: Jhantorian wine was an expensive variety of wine drunk during the reign of the Galactic Empire. It was served at the reception party thrown by Lady Valles Santhe in her family manor for the arrival of the Imperial Advisor Rodin Hlian Verpalion to the planet Lianna. At the party the wine flowed from the mouth of a large fountain in the shape of a dewback, which was the centerpiece of a buffet table in the dining area of the manor.
Jhantorian wine first appeared in Mission to Lianna, an adventure book released in 1992 and written by Joanne E. Wyrick for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
